imdb.plot outline: A medical drama that follows the last hours of Paul Harvin, who has suffered a severe and ultimately fatal injury. The medical staff provide urgent attention to his wounds while offering comfort and support in his time of need. A kind nurse aids Harvin in finding his estranged daughter with whom he wants to reconcile before he passes.
imdb.title: The Final Hours
plot: A medical drama that follows the last hours of Paul Harvin, who has suffered a severe and ultimately fatal injury. The medical staff provide urgent attention to his wounds while offering comfort and support in his time of need. A kind nurse aids Harvin in finding his estranged daughter with whom he wants to reconcile before he passes.::Krystal O'Connor
